name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Curtis JONES, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Curtis JONES, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of May, 2008, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity is:
Whether the Superior Court erred by concluding that probable cause did not support the issuance of the search warrant of a murder victim’s residence for investigatory purposes.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
950 A.2d 265
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Curtis JONES, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 27, 2008.
